name: Leanne Graham
review: Great selection of bikes and very helpful staff. They are willing to help you learn something verses judging you like other bike shops . Will be back again. Thanks to Alan for the help.

name: Quin Nolan
review: Took my bike for service. Totally worth the money, they made it look and ride like the day i bought it. Ask for Turner, the kid knows bikes. A+ couldn't be happier!

name: Hayden Read
review: Brandon helped me out with some knowledge and assistance on a bicycle someone gave me and he did an amazing job! Great customer service here.
